title: @Riot: Scuttle Crab plushie
body: I would pay so much for one of those. Who wouldn't want an adorable little plush crustacean running around their room?

replies.body: I need dis.

Katey pls.

Use your status as a Rioter to make this happen. You can do it.

How about just get a real scuttle crab.
